review: Great Experience with Dr. Anupama. Explained the situation, dealt with patience and suggested best possible treatment. Visited for tooth filings and extraction .

review: When the doctor explains the details and instills the confidence, you feel comfortable during the whole process of the treatment. That's what I experienced and have no after effects. No pain and a comfortable feel. Ready for the follow up  procedure.
Good we are satisfied with doctors'advise we are also satidsfied with our teeth treatment. In future we will come back at clinic for treatment

review: My daughter is 8years old and she had teeth decay problem. We went to there clinic, Dr Anupama treated my daughter frindly, *** *** **** **** ********* ** ** ********* It was wonderfull experience for my daughter.

Anupama Kiran is very meticulous and sincere to her profession.She will keep you informed about the condition of our tooth, what kind of treatment is being given with lots of patience.She did her best to save my almost gone molar.
I would definitely recommend her.
